name: Color Switch Replica (Mahammad Saquib)
description:
This Is An Inspirational 2D Arcade Game

A Fun and Learning Project Made From Brackey's Tutorials 

This Game Is A Replica Made By Myself For Learning and Fun

Objective: Avoid The Opposite Color Circles and Make It To The Last Of The Circle

Controls: Tap To Move and Stable Yourself

Assets By Brackeys and Audio Music Assets By Opensource "Vintage Porn"
